title: Goal-Setting and Self-Reflection-Based Education Program for Improving Expert Presentation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Presentation Experience and Professional Workplace Communication Skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, learners are professionals (medical/legal/technical) requiring improvement in work-related presentation skills.

learning_goals: Learners can design a 10-minute structured presentation on a specific work scenario within 8 weeks
Learners can evaluate performance outcomes against goals using three or more specific metrics in a self-reflection journal after the presentation
Based on peer feedback, learners can select and implement two core skills (e.g., voice modulation, visual aid utilization) for improvement in the next presentation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
